Yeah, the "fix" should be to throw an error in the backwards of:

  • normal
  • log_normal
  • cauchy
  • exponential
  • geometric
  • log_normal
  • bernoulli

Basically, anywhere Generator appears in derivatives.yaml

body:
Yeah, the "fix" should be to throw an error in the backwards of:

- normal
- log_normal
- cauchy
- exponential
- geometric
- log_normal
- bernoulli

Basically, anywhere Generator appears in derivatives.yaml
